channel.title: Aeolian Client - 508 Textures loaded onto a 317
channel.description:
[center][i][b]
Note: Some of you senior members have been saying that I didn't do anything, or it's easy to do. Yes it's [b][i]extremely[/i][/b] easy to do. You're missing the whole point of this thread. Most likely because you failed to read it. This client is meant to help mopar use a more stable client instead of a Bluurr's base which we all know mostly everyone with a delta-leech uses. I said in the thread that this is easy. I'm not even claiming this to be hard. You people like Primadude, Lin ect. You guys are focused on helping advanced moderate programmers. I'm focused on helping beginners, as I am a beginner myself. So please, read and have some respect.
-Thanks
Well, I'm making a strictly 317 server using Yorvicks framework on his scratch source. I wanted everything or to be perfect so for the client I chose the 317 Deob. However, Tom's client was sexier so I went with his. (Thanks Tom.)
Credits:
Jagex - For Deob ( really don't give a shit about them. ) Tom - For his base. (Basically, added Jframe, Mp3 ect. Aeolian - 508 Textures, Head Icons, fixed cache, Edited Cache, Aeolian.Mp3, more... Peter - For some programs
Anyways, I loaded the 508 textures to this 317 to give it an HD feel. Although it's far from HD. It's a fairly easy thing to do. But since a lot of mopar doesn't know how to do it, I thought I'd spoon feed them and do it for them. It's a pretty basic client. You can add a lot too at and still have it be stable.
I'm not expecting this to be a big hit. But I'd prefer people start using this instead of things like Bluurr's old client. (Sorry Bluurr, but you'll probably agree on this one.)
Notice there isn't a sprites folder. I edited the sprites without it. :\
IP is set to local host because I didn't want to advertise. Port 43594 as always. Pictures:
Loaded my own logo to get rid of the RuneScape name. (Sorry, you'll have to figure out how to remove. Think of it as my signature.)[/b][/i]
[IMG]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/779/40966711.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8478/42153973.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/3695/50969150.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1957/81204574.png[/img]
[i][b] Well, I hope you enjoy this client. I encourage you to use it. It's more stable and has less garbage in it. I'm not trying to be a 'pro' programmer. I'm simply just sharing this with the community whether you like it or not. [/b][/i] :)[/center]
[i]Link - http://uppit.com/v/PJH2YWIK
Mirror - http://www.mediafire.com/?4hqdmk0z2vj[/i]
NOTE: The file size is 22MB because I forgot to take out Mp3. It's an amazing song. You guys will enjoy the Aeolian Theme song. :) [b] ENJOY! :][/b]

item.dc:creator: @Duke_Nukem Duke Nukem
item.description:
@Duke_Nukem wrote:

Has anybody figured out how to remove his background and add our own?

I edited the Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java to put my background picture on, but yet his kind of shows through.

The torches are still going but they are black with darker flames, and the “Aeolian” is still there.

I’ve tried everything I know, can somebody help me out?

item.title: Aeolian Client - 508 Textures loaded onto a 317
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

[quote=“benscape, post:49, topic:285697”][quote author=teh_codex link=topic=377828.msg2843177#msg2843177 date=1246103286]
pft what by editing just the start of lumbridge? i said good job on the fences just why edit only lumby.?
[/quote]

And tbh it barely looks different anyway, i agree with you codex.[/quote]

I edited lumbridge a test for a program I made. It actually wasn’t even suppose to be in this client. You guys are missing the point. If a client with headicons and stability is available for download. Hopefully newbies will start using it instead of using unstable crap-filled clients. It’s just part of an effort to make a better community. I’m sorry if you don’t like.

Read full topic

item.title: Aeolian Client - 508 Textures loaded onto a 317
item.dc:creator: @Rushkid12 Rushkid12
item.description:
@Rushkid12 wrote:

good job i love it but how do i edit te catrs evry time i do it and save doesnt get what i want-Thanks

Well, I’m making a strictly 317 server using Yorvicks framework on his scratch source. I wanted everything or to be perfect so for the client I chose the 317 Deob. However, Tom’s client was sexier so I went with his. (Thanks Tom.)

Credits:

Jagex - For Deob ( really don’t give a shit about them. )
Tom - For his base. (Basically, added Jframe, Mp3 ect.
Aeolian - 508 Textures, Head Icons, fixed cache, Edited Cache, Aeolian.Mp3, more…
Peter - For some programs

Anyways, I loaded the 508 textures to this 317 to give it an HD feel. Although it’s far from HD. It’s a fairly easy thing to do. But since a lot of mopar doesn’t know how to do it, I thought I’d spoon feed them and do it for them. It’s a pretty basic client. You can add a lot too at and still have it be stable.

I’m not expecting this to be a big hit. But I’d prefer people start using this instead of things like Bluurr’s old client. (Sorry Bluurr, but you’ll probably agree on this one.)

Notice there isn’t a sprites folder. I edited the sprites without it. :\

IP is set to local host because I didn’t want to advertise. Port 43594 as always.
Pictures:

Loaded my own logo to get rid of the RuneScape name. (Sorry, you’ll have to figure out how to remove. Think of it as my signature.)[/b][/i]


Well, I hope you enjoy this client. I encourage you to use it. It’s more stable and has less garbage in it. I’m not trying to be a ‘pro’ programmer. I’m simply just sharing this with the community whether you like it or not.

:)[/center]

[i]Link - http://uppit.com/v/PJH2YWIK

Mirror - http://www.mediafire.com/?4hqdmk0z2vj[/i]

NOTE: The file size is 22MB because I forgot to take out Mp3. It’s an amazing song. You guys will enjoy the Aeolian Theme song.

ENJOY! :]
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Aeolian Client - 508 Textures loaded onto a 317
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:42, topic:285697”][quote author=Aeolian link=topic=377828.msg2844231#msg2844231 date=1246171538]
You guys are missing the point of this client.

I want people to start using this client as it is more stable. If every dropped Bluurr’s old client and started using this one, better stability would be in play.
[/quote]
Its not that i dont wnat to use your client, its more that i have edited my client to the standards that i love. I do not want to get rid of it. I have been working on a completely custom equipment interface and stuff as well. (so far i have most of the prayer icons re-done)[/quote]

I understand that. This client is meant to target people who may have just joined Mopar. It’s getting them used to good habits. This will teach them more in the long run.

Get what I’m saying now?

Read full topic
